pages.text: Kerygmachela is a gilled lobopodian from northern Greenland. Its appendages were shaped like a grappler and it probably ate very small prey given that its mouth was relatively small.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
